biotools.summary: EllipTrack is a global-local cell-tracking pipeline for 2D Fluorescence Time-Lapse Microscopy. EllipTrack is a global-local hybrid cell tracker optimized for tracking modern large-scale movies. EllipTrack introduces a local track correction module.

bioschemas.name: EllipTrack
bioschemas.summary: EllipTrack is a global-local cell-tracking pipeline for 2D Fluorescence Time-Lapse Microscopy. EllipTrack is a global-local hybrid cell tracker optimized for tracking modern large-scale movies. EllipTrack introduces a local track correction module.
